        Parameters:
        doc - the document to write to the String
        format - the formatter to use

        a string representation of the document

      • newValidatingSAXEngine

        public static org.jdom2.input.sax.SAXEngine newValidatingSAXEngine(Source[] schemaSources)
                                                            throws SAXException,
                                                                   org.jdom2.JDOMException
        A convenience method to construct a new validating SAXEngine based on a collection of schema sources. Any registered resolver extensions are also setup with the SAXEngine.
        Parameters:
        schemaSources - an array of schema to use for validation
        Returns:
        a new SAXEngine instance
        Throws:
        SAXException - if an error occurred while parsing the schema
        org.jdom2.JDOMException - if an error occurred while constructing the SAXEngine
        See Also:
        ResourceResolverExtensionService

                                                            throws SAXException,
                                                                   org.jdom2.JDOMException
        Throws:
        SAXException
        org.jdom2.JDOMException
